title: The Cobra's Lair
description: Enter Varedo, a sun-soaked Old World city rife with intrigue. Varedo's great general, Julian del Razur, has returned home for the first time in years to investigate growing corruption in the city at the command of the empress. There he meets an old friend, stages a daring rescue, and faces a dark threat of which he's never even dreamed.  "The Cobra's Lair" is the first short of a pulp serial which will be published over the course of the year, each part about 14,000 words in length each.
author: Meghan Godbout
